socketedItems.typeLine: Anomalous Elemental Damage with Attacks Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills, making their projectiles fork into two projectiles the first time they hit an enemy and don't pierce it.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a projectile from a Wand that causes a series of small explosions surrounding its point of impact, each damaging enemies caught in the area.
explicitMods: Projectiles gain 34% increased Area of Effect after Forking
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 16% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25
Supported Skills deal 11% increased Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect.

20% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: The great city of storms, washed away by Vinktar's thirst for power.

items.name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
20% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take 7% increased Damage
Recover 3% of Energy Shield when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

items.name: Obliteration
implicitMods: 5% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
explicitMods: Gain 31% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Enemies you Kill have a 20% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage
flavourText: We forge order from the world around us
Wielding anarchy and destruction as our tools of genesis.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Place a Frost Shield that drains your energy shield for one second or until you run out, gaining stages while this drain occurs. The Frost Shield takes some damage from hits in place of you and allies while in its area. Enemies in the area are Chilled. You can only have one Frost Shield active at once.
explicitMods: 20% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies in Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
60% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies outside Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
You gain +0.23% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
Frost Shield has 390 maximum Life per Stage
Gains 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while you are losing Energy Shield
You lose 310 Energy Shield per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Reserves mana to apply a buff and leave afterimages of your recent past. Cast the spell again to return to the oldest afterimage, teleporting to that location as well as resetting your Life, Mana and Energy Shield to the values they had then.
explicitMods: This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
Buff makes you Unaffected by Temporal Chains
